message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40.  It's in our best interest to settle this quickly.
I think we should meet in the middle, 55-45 is a fair deal.
I understand you want a fair deal, but waiting longer hurts you more than it hurts me.  I'm willing to stick to my previous offer: $60 for me, $40 for you.  Let's close this out.
I'm willing to compromise, 52-48 is as low as I'll go. Waiting further will only make it worse for both of us.
Bob, it's clear we both want to end this.  I'm coming down to $58, you get $42.  This is a concession - let's be reasonable and wrap this up.
